mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.variety_id AS "varietyInfo.id", bvi.name AS "varietyInfo.name", a.attribute_id AS "attributeInfo.id", sai.name AS "attributeInfo.name", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id"
LEFT JOIN biz_variety_info bvi ON bvi.id = a.variety_id LEFT JOIN sys_attribute_info sai ON sai.id = a.attribute_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_variety_attr( id, variety_id, attribute_id, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_time, update_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{varietyInfo.id}, #{attributeInfo.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_variety_attr SET variety_id = #{varietyInfo.id}, attribute_id = #{attributeInfo.id}, create_id = #{createBy.id}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_time = #{updateDate}, update_id = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
